description: Try our easy to follow Avocado With Prawn Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Prawn salad,Pescatarian,Prawn,Soy free,Tree nut free,Avocado,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Avocado With Prawn Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup cooked prawns, peeled and deveined
0.5 firm pear, peeled and finely diced
0.5 long red chilli, seeded and finely diced
2 baby cos, cut into wedges (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Halve the avocadoes and remove the seeds. Cut a small flat surface on the base so that they sit on plates.
Combine the prawns, pear, onion, dill and chilli in a bowl and mix well. Add the aioli and stir to combine, then spoon into the avocado
Serve with baby cos wedge salad and ranch dressing.
